title: Analysis
description: We have compiled and analyzed a comprehensive dataset encompassing the six-year span from 2014 through to 2020.

title: Data
description: Enhancement of the analysis through the integration of key traffic data from New York City

title: Visualization
description: The data is visualized in a variety of ways usging D3.js and Leaflet.js to provide a comprehensive view of the bike patterns in New York City.
